    • Method Detail

      • removeNonPrintable

        public static Filter removeNonPrintable()
        Creates a filter which removes all the non-printable characters matching NON_PRINTABLE_PATTERN in the input string.
        Returns:
        the filter

      • replaceInString

        public static Filter replaceInString(Pattern regexp,
                                     String replacement,
                                     int overlap)
        Creates a filter which replaces every substring in the input string that matches the given regular expression and replaces it with given replacement.

        The method just calls String.replaceAll(String, String) for the input string.

        Parameters:
        regexp - the regular expression
        replacement - the string to be substituted for each match
        overlap - the number of characters prepended to the matching string from the previous data chunk before match
        Returns:
        the filter

      • replaceInString

        public static Filter replaceInString(String regexp,
                                     String replacement)
        Equivalent to replaceInString(java.util.regex.Pattern, String) but takes the regular expression as string and default overlap in 80 characters.
        Parameters:
        regexp - the regular expression
        replacement - the string to be substituted for each match
        Returns:
        the filter

      • replaceInString

        public static Filter replaceInString(Pattern regexp,
                                     String replacement)
        Equivalent to replaceInString(java.util.regex.Pattern, String, int) but takes the regular expression as string and default overlap in 80 characters.
        Parameters:
        regexp - the regular expression
        replacement - the string to be substituted for each match
        Returns:
        the filter

      • replaceInBuffer

        public static Filter replaceInBuffer(Pattern regexp,
                                     String replacement)
        Creates a filter which replaces every substring in the input buffer that matches the given regular expression and replaces it with given replacement.

        The method just calls String.replaceAll(String, String) for the entire buffer contents every time new data arrives,

        Parameters:
        regexp - the regular expression
        replacement - the string to be substituted for each match
        Returns:
        the filter

      • chain

        public static Filter chain(Filter... filters)
        Combines the filters in a filter chain.

        The given filters are applied one by one in the order that hey appear in the method argument list.

        The string returns by the Filter.beforeAppend(String, StringBuilder) method of one filter is passed a parameter to the next one if it is not null. If it is null, then the beforeAppend won't be called any more and the latest non-null result is appended to the expect internal buffer.

        If the return value of the Filter.afterAppend(StringBuilder) method is true, then all the calls of this method on the consequent filters will be suppressed.

        Parameters:
        filters - the filters, not null
        Returns:
        the combined filter
